title: The Notebook
summary: A young couple falls in love during the early years of World War II, but their love is tested as they struggle with separation and distance.

title: Pride and Prejudice
summary: In this adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Elizabeth Bennet navigates the complexities of love and social expectations while falling for the aloof Mr. Darcy.

title: Titanic
summary: A young couple from different social backgrounds fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic during its maiden voyage.

title: La La Land
summary: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love but struggle to maintain their relationship as they chase their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
summary: Two teenagers who have cancer fall in love after meeting in a support group, but their journey together is filled with challenges.

title: A Walk to Remember
summary: A rebellious young man falls in love with a quiet, religious girl, and their relationship changes their lives in unexpected ways.

title: Before Sunrise
summary: Two strangers meet on a train and spend a night walking around Vienna, talking and getting to know each other, which leads to an intense connection.

title: Notting Hill
summary: A simple bookseller meets a famous actress in the charming neighborhood of Notting Hill, leading to an unlikely and turbulent romance.

title: Love Actually
summary: Eight different couples in London navigate the ups and downs of love during the holiday season.

title: The Vow
summary: After a car accident, a woman loses her memory and her husband must win back her heart even though she no longer remembers their love.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
summary: A young man and woman fall in love while traveling across Europe, but they must overcome family expectations and cultural differences.

title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
summary: A son is estranged from his family after marrying against their wishes. The movie explores themes of love, family, and sacrifice.

title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
summary: A man is torn between his love for a woman and his duty as a soldier. His past comes back to haunt him as he faces life-threatening challenges.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
summary: A love triangle where one of the characters is not ready to accept their true feelings, leading to heartbreak and emotional growth.

title: Tamasha
summary: A man struggles with his identity and his love life, eventually rediscovering his true self while traveling and exploring his relationship with a woman.

title: Barfi!
summary: A mute and deaf man navigates life and love, with two women having a profound impact on his journey, filled with humor, emotion, and drama.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
summary: A man with a terminal illness brings joy to a woman's life and helps her find love, but he also keeps a secret about his condition.

title: Dil To Pagal Hai
summary: A dance troupe director is torn between his love for two women, both of whom have different perspectives on love and relationships.

title: Student of the Year
summary: A love triangle develops between three students at St. Teresa's College, as they compete for the coveted 'Student of the Year' trophy.

title: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
summary: A man pretends to be someone else to win the love of a woman, but eventually, his true feelings come to light.
